document.full_text: chrysler group llc reported its first quarterly net profit since emerging from bankruptcy nearly two years ago, helped by a revamped lineup of cars and trucks as well as higher vehicle prices.
document.title: chrysler reports first quarterly net profit since 2009
lines_and_colors: chrysler group llc reported its first quarterly net profit since emerging from bankruptcy nearly two years ago, helped by a revamped lineup of cars and trucks as well as higher vehicle prices.
